name: Automagoria - Definitive Edition
description:
You are an automaton. You wake up in a mysterious undeground lab. Your creator has left a final message for you: the world has been attacked by monsters and you must save her daughter. Armed with a knife, you set out on a journey through a post-apocalyptic world full of hideous monsters. But what happened? Where do the monsters come from? What's your real task?

After 2 years, AUTOMAGORIA is back!
The new definitive version includes many improvements such as:
-new consistent color palette
-updated soundtrack
-no more instadeath from gray spikes
-no more instadeath from acid
-some tedious sections have been removed
-updated tilesets
-updated bosses
-improved gameplay
-the difficulty of some bosses has been adjusted in order to be more balanced

Warning: Automagoria contains intense pixel cartoon violence, alcohol reference, mild language, disturbing imagery, pixel rotten bodies, pixel mutilated corpses, pixel body horror, pixel suicide, flashing lights, jumpscares and rage inducing gameplay. Please proceed with caution. You have been warned.

Created by Axel Vejar Dossow using the Rpg Maker 2003 software.

Cover artwork by Froggy/Depths_of_escapism

Features:

-Depressing (but somewhat hopeful) storyline -Over 10 bosses that require you to learn their patterns -Over 15 stages filled with horrors and puzzles -Oppressing atmosphere -Original soundtrack with 28 unique songs -Retro pixel ART -Secret paths (can you find them?) -3 different difficulty levels (easy, normal, insane) -DAB mode that allows you to DAB (very annoying and can't be turned off)
